mapper.insert: insert into tbl_Plan_Detail (plan_detail_id, plan_id, category_id, contents_id, title, plan_Detail_startTime, plan_detail_endTime, plan_detail_date) values(#{planDetailID},#{planID},#{categoryID}, #{contentsID}, #{title},#{planDetailStartTime}, #{planDetailEndTime}, #{planDetailDate})
mapper.select: select detail.plan_Detail_ID, detail.plan_ID, detail.contents_ID, detail.title, detail.plan_Detail_StartTime,detail.plan_Detail_EndTime, detail.plan_Detail_Date, detail.category_ID, memo.memo_contents, picture.memo_Picture_Name from tbl_Plan_Detail detail left join tbl_Memo memo on detail.plan_Detail_ID = memo.plan_Detail_ID left join tbl_Memo_Picture picture on memo.plan_Detail_ID = picture.plan_Detail_ID where detail.plan_ID = #{planID} order by plan_Detail_Date asc , plan_Detail_StartTime asc
